title: Swift and valueForKeyPath: You Can’t Keep A Good API Down!
description: tl;dr; Download the Value For Key Path Playground I was incredibly disappointed in Swift when I started to look into how key value coding might be preserved in the transition from Objective-C. Of course, Apple would preserve that, right? And I don’t mean by resorting to using Foundation classes–you know all type-casty and everything (yeah, […]
